website_summaries.verdict: Owning a complete set of TV trays instead of purchasing individual pieces makes good economic sense for families and those who need spare tables for dinner parties or craft projects.
pros: Solid beechwood material with a light natural finish
Store flat on a notched stand
Generous table top dimensions, good for craft projects or laptops
Trays can be combined for larger needs
cons: Stand may not be completely level after assembly
Some complaints about missing or damaged hardware

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and durable and solid wood
customer_reviews.text: These are very good value for the price. They are all solid wood —a blonde hardwood that I don’t recognize. They go together easily and stack well. Very handy for an extra table for any reason. Some reviews say that the rack is flimsy. I don’t agree. It is well made and even has plugs for the screw holes to dress it up. Nicely designed and easy to manage. This would have been 5 Stars except one tray has a 4” crack in it. Doesn’t hurt performance but should be fixed. Will contact mfg and change to 5 stars if they make good. Nevertheless versatile and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: smithcover

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! 3 of the 4 tables were broken in some way. Every piece had a crack or chip in it. As you can see in the pictures this was right out of the box. The box was damage free though, so this was intentionally shipped this way! I am returning this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Unstable
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand all of the good reviews. Perhaps these are made in more than one country and the quality varies due to that? The one I received had a "Made in Thailand" sticker. The table I opened was lightweight, flimsy and unstable, with one of the legs not touching the floor by almost an inch so I didn't open any more of them and am returning the set. The set was very well packed but that only made it harder to get back into the box for the return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are junk. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: one of the trays has broken after only one use. The metal rod broke in two just below it's mounting point as I attempted to slide the legs into place and as that piece came apart, the wood table top started to crack in half and splinter. I didn't expect these things to last forever, but lasting less than a week is really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Perye - Rogue Estate BBQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these trays five years ago in oak and loved them. I just purchased the latest version in black last week and was please to find that they made improvements and reinforced the trays. I liked the feel of tying on my laptop so much, I bought another order before posting this review! Buy with confidence and enjoy the portability and stability of this 5-piece TV Table Set before I purchase them all and I am totally serious!
customer_reviews.author: Squizzy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as expected . Item is very heavy duty wood , quality is excellent and the stand to store them in is convenient . The tables come fully assembled but the stand does not . It comes with an Allen wrench so no additional tools are necessary
customer_reviews.author: R. Otten

customer_reviews.title: The stand is not sturdy - leans one way or the other
customer_reviews.text: After some minor use, the finish on the top quickly peeled significantly off each of these (only used wet (water) paper towels to wipe clean, followed by drying with clean/dry paper towels). Will have to re-finish. The stand is not sturdy - leans one way or the other. We have to lean it against a wall to prevent it from falling over. Not what we expected for $84.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Spevak

customer_reviews.title: After ten months, disintegration and injury
customer_reviews.text: Ten months after buying this, these tables have started to fall apart. The screw holes have stripped and now the screws fall out. Just today, my finger was badly pinched when the screws failed making the table fold over on itself and injuring me in the process. If you're looking for a dangerous TV table that fails in less than a year, this may be just what you need. If you prefer non-injurious furniture, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Shore

customer_reviews.title: Not very good .... even with occassional use.
customer_reviews.text: Despite only occassional use, this TV Table Set is only good for a few months before the manufacture-installed screws start falling out. The stand for the trays isn't very good and began to give out .... requiring the stand be leaned against a wall in order to support the trays. That defeats the purpose of the stand, right?! Also, one of the supports for a tray broke which causes anything on it to fall as the tray unexpectantly collapses from time to time. Now, I'm stuck with a pile of wood that'll soon be toss to the curb for the garbage man. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: We have barely had these trays for one year and I would say they are the worst! Screws randomly fall out of the trays when we go to open and close them. When we try to put the screws back in, they won't go in because it's stripped. The stand is so wobbly, when we put the trays back, it seems like the whole thing is going to fall over--even though we have tightened it on several occasions. For what I paid for these trays, I thought they would have been much better quality. Very disappointed. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box the treys arrived in, my first thought was they looked nice. While unpacking them I noticed one of the treys had a broken guide rod. I wasn't concerned. Figured I would solder it. The first time we used them 3 screws fell out of one trey. Apparently the manufacturer over tightened several of the screws and stripped out the pilot hole. Now I have a choice, drill new holes and do the job right myself or purchase a different set of treys from a different manufacturer. Haven't decided yet. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: billy hayes

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED and UNSANDED!
customer_reviews.text: None of the reviews I saw had this problem, but EVERY single one of my tables were unsanded and unfinished on the table edges (and partly on the surface for 3 of them). Only one was decent, but still had one side unsanded. it was ROUGH and SPLINTTERY. I couldn't believe it. They picked up my return so I am hopeful to get my refund soon. Will NOT buy again and will NOT recommend. Photos were unable to capture the roughness, so i decided not to upload. I think this is my first 1 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Cyanide

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you only need 2 tables, not four, because at least 2 of them will quickly break.
customer_reviews.text: You are actually paying for 2 TV tables and the stand because 2 of them will break within a month or so of use. At that price- not really a deal. The holes for the piece that support the table top aren't drilled properly- some are counter sunk and some aren't causing the screws to quickly work loose. They are a super money saver, but make sure you have a charged drill, bits and a selection of screw lengths available. If your time is worth more than $10/hour then I recommend spending a bit more. *update 2/2019-only 1 table & 0 stand still survive*
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood trays with minor assembly issues with the rack.
customer_reviews.text: These Winsome Alex TV trays are nicely made and finished. They open and close easily and are stable on the floor. As my wife and I assembled the racks, (we bought a set for our daughter and one for our son) one rack's holes were pre-drilled slightly out of alignment so that in the end, the one set has trays that do not sit on the rack as straight as they should. The assembly was, otherwise, quite straight-forward following the more than adequate provided directions. All in all, our adult kids will use these frequently and no doubt be glad to have them. Winsome should be a bit more certain of where the rack holes are drilled for user assembly.
customer_reviews.author: hifiman5

customer_reviews.title: They are study & look nice. Only complant is that the screws are very ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I use these tables several times a week & have been using for about 4 months now. They are study & look nice. Only complant is that the screws are very loose & do fall out fairly often. It doesn't mess up how they work & are very easy to screw back in. Tip: Try to screw in as tight as possible & just keep an eye out for any falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit disappointed when I got them
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find these for 40 dollars and the reviews were overall positive. I was a bit disappointed when I got them. The wood is cheap. They work fine it's just not as nice as I was expecting. They aren't so bad that I'd send them back but if I had it to do over again I probably wouldn't have spent the extra 20 bucks (there's another nice looking set for 60 on amazon) for something a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Black

customer_reviews.title: Lack of a hinge to hold slider when open causes table to collapse easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, but the design is flawed. When the tray legs are extended with opened. Problem is, there is no latch to hold it in place and when bumped, it collapses and crashes to the floor and anything on it goes with it. Will need to find a better quality item than this or continue to have dishes and stuff falling off these table trays. Will not recommend this product as-is nor will I recommend it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for an Excellent Set of TV Tables
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the very high quality of this TV table set. It is constructed of actual wood, not particle board, and it is well put together. The tables are fully assembled upon delivery, and all I needed to put together was the storage stand. The box contained exactly the parts, screws, instructions and even the tool(!) I needed to complete that task in a matter of minutes. (It is clear that the bulky stand would not have fit into the carton fully assembled, so it made perfect sense that it arrived the way it did.) These are high quality tables at an excellent price. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Enderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very useful for dinner by the TV.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 5 piece set which has held up very well since 2017. I can not speak for the assembly of the stand as I am just now attempting to put that together. The snack stands work beautifully for casual dinner in the den by the tv. My elderly father loved using this table for everything including eating his meals. Very sturdy and well made. If only I could locate the directions to assemble the stand....
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice T. V. Tray Set
customer_reviews.text: We got them to give as a gift. We put them together because the box they come in is so heavy. It wasn't too hard to put them together. My husband and I helped each other. One of the screw holes was stripped. I put a match stick down in it and that allowed the screw to tighten up. Hope it will hold up. I think they look pretty good. They are a smaller set. I expected that and actually wanted the smaller set. They weren't scratched up. They look good. The rack they sit on is a little wobbly, but not bad. It's a pretty nice little set.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Table holder broken and poorly repaired
customer_reviews.text: The tables themselves are exactly what i needed and wanted. The stand that holds the 4 tables however came broken and poorly repaired. It came glued back together from the company and as soon as you try to put the screw in all you get is a cracking noise. Not sure how long it will hold up, but shame on the company for sending me something that is already broken and a poor job as repairing it with glue.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy

customer_reviews.title: These were very nice. Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were very nice. Not perfect, but nice. There was some hardware missing and I had to write the manufacturer. They were very responsive and quickly supplied the missing screws, but not the needed dowels. Fortunately I had some in my workshop that I was able to cut to fit. WIth all that, this was still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Augustin

customer_reviews.title: Snack table
customer_reviews.text: The tables are of good quality and they are sturdy. The same can not be said for the stand that holds them. During assembly some of the holes and screws did not line up properly so that when the stand was assembled it wobbled and needed to be taken apart and redone which resulted it some improvement. The tables are still not even when sitting in the stand. Also the quality of the wood for the stand is not good. It cracks when you assemble the bottom part of the stand. I would not buy this item if I had to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: TV Land  with Trays
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in tact and on time! Easy set up and all the parts were there, holes were correct and once assembled pretty sturdy with trays and stand. We use this weekly so the use factor should be ok, One thing I did notice, on the bottom of one of the trays the manufacturer used wood filler for the wood towards the edge. No worries, but shows the kind of quality control the manufacturer puts into the product. Attached is a picture of fully assembled set. I am very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Sez

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the set and took them out of the box. The smell is disgusting! The strongest chemical smell I've ever smelled before. I quickly put them out on my deck to air out. It's not helping. I might have to send back. I just don't understand why distributors or companies sell this crap! I just put it together and it's even worse than I thought. My old ones holder was sturdy, this is NOT! For the money don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: P. A. O. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Good tv tray. Okay quality.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. However, after putting them together, there were a few pieces that arrived broken. For the price we paid we did not feel like dealing with the hassle of returning them so we fixed them ourselves with some wood glue and wooden dowels which we already had at home (big DIYers). For the price they are okay. Sturdy enough and finish seems like it will hold up. Stand is slightly flimsy, yes we assembled it properly, but it sits in a corner and is not messed with until we use a tray so no real issue there. They do what they are intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: alross

customer_reviews.title: and looked nice taking them out of the packaging
customer_reviews.text: These arrived as expected, and looked nice taking them out of the packaging. But when I stood them up, immediately 2 screws fell out. I tried to put them back in but the holes were stripped. Also these are lighter weight (cheaper!) than some others I have had. They aren't very sturdy. Finally the stand doesn't sit solid, leaning either forward or backward. I would not recommend these, either pay more money for better quality or expect less. Much less.
customer_reviews.author: Hobartes

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I usually read other reviews before purchasing. After reading some of the negative reviews on this item I was hesitant to purchase it. But since it was exactly what I was looking for I decided to take a chance and order the TV tables and stand. I am very happy that I did! I had no difficulty removing it from the packaging. It was easy to assemble the stand. The whole set is light weight and easy to lift with the handle. The tables are sleek and modern looking and compliment my decor. My wife is very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George Koons

customer_reviews.title: great little set
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than the typical tv trays and very lightweight, I gave it four stars because they could be easily tipped over, however, fits perfectly into my decor and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Rochele R

customer_reviews.title: Practical item to have
customer_reviews.text: We have a tiled living room with black leather furniture. Needed the black tables to match decor. These tables can be used for having dinner, serving snacks, coloring/writing on, etc. Perfect when the grandkids are in town. The tables are sturdy and do not wobble (we do not have a rug which could present a problem). They can only be used flat (no angle for computer use) and they do not have any type of ledge to hold items from falling. However, they are sturdy and good for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Sturdy Table Set
customer_reviews.text: This little set is perfect for kiddos who love dinner-and-a-movie nights! I love that we can put the tables away when they're not in use, too. These tables are pretty sturdy and easy to set up and take down, and the stand only took about 5-10 minutes to put together. (The tool and screws you need come with the set!)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Inez

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose but folding is not smooth and I can see another easily breaking, so we are being very careful when ...
customer_reviews.text: First day we used them, one of them broke. The metal bar underneath broke off at welded spot, when closing up. My husband tried to re-glue, but it only lasted a few weeks and broke again. We used them for the holidays and when we snack in the living room. They serve their purpose but folding is not smooth and I can see another easily breaking, so we are being very careful when folding.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey18

customer_reviews.title: Not constructed well. They will fall apart with very light use.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly constructed. The screws were over turned so the holes were bored out. Screws started falling out after a couple of weeks. After that they just fell apart. With work and new screws and new holes I have put them back together and more sturdy than before. So unlesss you want a big project down the road, buy any brand other than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Cordell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Support arm cut in half.
customer_reviews.text: I like the trays quite a bit, however when I was unpacking them, I found one tray with a cut (see photo). I tried to call the phone number listed, but it went to a fax machine. I just want a replacement table for the one that is cut. If I can get that, I’ll happily give the product a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Scottinkga

customer_reviews.title: One tray arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Wanted tv trays to put beside Mah Jongg players to hold sodas, snacks, etc. Unfortunately, one tray arrived broken. Did a return/replace and the new set arrived very quickly. Unfortunately the holder for the trays was drilled very badly indeed and it couldn't be used. I'm in the process of returning it to, no replacing it this time.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia DuPree

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: The tables, at first glance and use work well but with slight usage and simple movement they will break; screws will fall out (out of nowhere) and the support bar will break. I exchanged my set for a replacement set once before but now I’m stuck with this one. Spend more money on something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Quality, look exactly like the picture. Shape and shade of brown.
customer_reviews.text: Came packed well, only thing that needed assembly was the stand that holds the TV trays. The stands are sturdy, appear well built and the color is a rich medium brown. They are made in Thailand and are solid wood. The holder is very sturdy as well. Overall I'm very pleased with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: These snack trays are beautifully finished and exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These snack trays are beautifully finished and exactly as pictured. Some assembly is required, but this did not take long. We received the tables within the delivery time frame given. Overall, we are pleased and would buy again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2Boyzzz

customer_reviews.title: Honestly is not like we have used them every single day
customer_reviews.text: I should start by saying that I bought these tables back in 2009. Almost 10 years later and they are still in use. Honestly is not like we have used them every single day, but there were some points in our life where we used them for months at a time and they are still as good as new. They are not super sturdy, but they are as stable as you can expect a TV tray to be. I don't know if the quality has changed since we bought them, but they worked perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these a couple weeks ago and have been using the trays to eat on while watching football/tennis on tv. I put the stand together today-took about 15 minutes-all the parts and an Allen wrench necessary to assemble the stand were included. The trays and the stand are fairly lightweight but sturdy. All in all, I’m very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend these TV trays w/stand.
customer_reviews.author: clarkduck

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of these in the light wood color, and I love them even more than I expected to. My husband and I live alone, and we usually don't bother eating supper at the table anymore. These trays are sturdy (they feel secure even when using a knife to cut meat), they have a nice finish that wipes clean easily, and the whole set tucks neatly into a small corner. I just bought another set in black for my stepdaughter; she works from home and has to have a desk/work area instead of a dining table, so she and her BF have to eat at the coffee table. These trays will be perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pretty crappy but will do in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely low end even for snack tables. Ordered it to be a set to a table I had in the same style but my older table is MUCH better quality. These feel flimsy, have different wood grains and you can see the seams, have multiple dents/gouges in them right out of the box and the stand sits crooked because the assembly holes are off.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: What more could you ask for - you can put things on these and it holds your stuff. We use them for our d&d campaigns so that everyone can have their own extra table and keep the main play area clear. The stand for the tables seems a bit wobbly, but we don't move it around much so it hasn't been an issue. (And probably can be tightened, just haven't bothered to check).
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: The stand does not line up properly to store the TV tray tables.
customer_reviews.text: The carton was perfect when delivered. After assembly of stand I noticed the table brackets did not line up causing an uneven appearance with tables on the stand. I called Winsome, they sent new stand parts but they were identical to the original, so no go. After spending way too much time on this project, I contacted Amazon and they had the set picked up the next day. It’s a shame because it’s really a nice set. The company needs to adjust where they place holes to insure it stores trays level. Can’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RON W LANGNAS

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I like these tables just fine. They seem to be good quality. They work as expected and store nicely on the rack. My only complaint is that they don't actually lock in place like the old fashioned metal ones did so there is always the chance that if you slide it or lift it that the legs that slide open may try to close up and cause it to tip. So far we have not had that problem but we are very careful when repositioning them. All in all they are a nice product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV Trays
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? If you need some TV trays, you've found them. They're easy to assemble and are well made. I like that they come with a rack that you can hang them on when you want them out of the way. I purchased these after seeing them at a friend's house. We're both very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for socially distanced backyard meals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could have a few people over and we can socially distance while eating on the patio (we take the virus seriously in NY). They are lightweight and big enough for that purpose. They arrived on time and in good shape. I haven't put together the stand. The tables come assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer88

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Change Wood Screws
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but i had to buy a pack of 1” wood screws and replace all 40 screws on the tv trays. It was $10 worth of screws. No Biggie. The screws that were in them were not wide or deep enough. Took me $10 and 20 mins to fix all five pieces. If you don’t replace the screws easily will fall apart after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: mike noel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality set at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set of tray tables. The best we found at a very reasonable price. When they were delivered everything was intact and in perfect shape. The only thing with our order was that the screws to put the tray table holding rack together were missing. We contacted customer service and they sent replacement parts immediately. Was really impressed with the no nonsense speed and professionalism by which they responded. A+ Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Williams

customer_reviews.title: They "stack up," but they aren't perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I had two tables from a deceased friend, who went out of his way to find things of the best quality. These are only close. For example, these aren't smooth on the bottom of the tray part (the originals are). The price you pay with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Winslow

customer_reviews.title: What I liked the most was you can use them
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most was you can use them:(. With that being said I expected something much more sturdy. I have now had them for over two years and now think I can really put up a well used review. I would not buy again or recommend them to anyone. They are very cheaply made for the price, the holder is junk and the trays wobble. I wanted black in this room, other brand for same price in a natural stain were more than twice the quality! Bottom line not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: John L. Cason

customer_reviews.title: The best tables for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and had it together in 15 min and I am 71 yrs young. They look great and set up easy. Since reading other reviews i am going to take precautions and put a clear coating over them to protect the finish. For what i spent on these tables i know i got a good deal, if you know what wood cost you would agree. My great grandkids are going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Personality

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to assemble the holder, but wood is a little soft and some tables wobble
customer_reviews.text: We use these tables almost daily and they've held up pretty well. they do tend to wobble a bit, but some sanding can easily level them. The wood looks really nice, but it is soft. If you have an animal that likes to chew they can do some damage pretty quickly if you don't catch them. The surface is nicely treated and makes cleaning easy, and the table holder was easy to assemble when it arrived. We've had the tables almost two years, and they are still serving their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Zack M

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. It’s very light wood and within the first week of having them all of the screws fell out of the bottom of one. Not exactly ideal when you have an eight month old crawling around. My husband put the three screws back in but could tell it was stripped. They are also so light weight that it takes almost nothing to knock them over. Just terrible overall.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal Dowel Rods Came Unglued
customer_reviews.text: Tables are as advertised. Functional and good-looking. However, the horizontal dowel rods were not sufficiently glued at the factory. As a result, I’ve had to re-glue at least one of the dowel ends on three of the tables.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Missing stand pieces. Didn't return it lol to much ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing stand pieces. Didn't return it lol to much work! They are not the old school tables that are a bit heavier and have a bit of a premium feel to it, these are a bit thin an kinda ligjt but well built. For the price and quality worth it! One of my table screws came out an the bar broke I haven't been rough with the table an only had it a little over a month. probably just a bad build!
customer_reviews.author: Kyrece

customer_reviews.title: The stand is horrible. The wood cracks easily when the screws are ...
customer_reviews.text: Trays are decent. The stand is horrible. The wood cracks easily when the screws are tightened. I thought perhaps it was too tight, but the screws aren't even fully flushed when it starts chipping. I've assembled pretty much everything in my house - tv entertainment systems, dressers, bad frames - confident enough to say it is the product and not the assembler. Will use the trays, but wouldn't recommend or buy the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: nice tables, work well
customer_reviews.text: These are nice tables. Once assembled, the holder is great too. My biggest complain is that there is no way to lock them open, and if you lift them even slightly, they retract to fold up. This makes it hard to move them around one handed.
customer_reviews.author: willisotaTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I got the item and it was missing more parts than not. It was missing 1 of 2 rack pieces (E), all 12 wood screws (F), 4 wood dowels (G), 4 Wood Plug (H), and 1 Hex wrench. The paperwork has a form for missing parts but the fine print says they want original form and original proof of purchase and even then, they may decide to not give me the parts. Winsome brand should've been called “lose some”
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great tables!
customer_reviews.text: I downsized and needed some "snack" or "TV" tables in black. The surface area of these tables is a little smaller than I am used to, but perfect for my apartment. There are so many uses for tables like these, not only for eating in front of the TV. I use one to hold pictures in the space between my desk and media center. Another is by a window for my plants. And yes, I use one for eating! Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Alida B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and size.
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice size and perfect height for eating, working on my laptop, writing, and otherwise. My large dog can’t get to my food now which is nice. The only negative thing I have to say is that they are very light weight. I was expecting a heavier, more durable wood. I feel like if one were to top off of the stand, it may chip or break the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie DiGiulio

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Looks good. Sturdy. Flexible. I just moved into a new manufactured home and space is at a premium. I’ve decided no coffee table but the four of these wooden TV tables are very portable and can be used for a variety of occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Tink

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I looked extensively for a set of these tables from target, Walmart, etc. and these had the best reviews and price. They come assembled, are great quality and the holding stand is easy to put together. Took fifteen minutes. The tables are extremely sturdy and look great- they do not look cheap and are well made. Glad i chose this product.
customer_reviews.author: E F

customer_reviews.title: Tables fine but stand for them did not piece together
customer_reviews.text: The tables are fine but the pieces for the stand to hold them all did not fit together. Those bits go in the trash. Since I’ll be using the tables regularly and not storing them away, I kept the tables but otherwise would have returned it all.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & stable at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables. Very stable and sturdy. The hardware for assembling the tray stand caddy was missing in my box. One email to the company and I had the replacement packet of hardware in two days. They confirmed receipt of my complaint and sent a message to let me know the parts were on the way. Great communication. Despite this slight inconvenience I couldn’t be happier with the tables.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Ann's Review
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great! Very easy to assemble. They go well with the rest of our furniture. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a little extra space to enjoy dinner or snacks in front of the television!
customer_reviews.author: Pisceschild

customer_reviews.title: They Look Good!
customer_reviews.text: The fist set of trays I got...Two of the trays were broken and lookd as if someone had opend and returned them. The second ones I got were packaged a lot differnt (Very solid). No broken bits, some of the legs still were not glued in my Roomate end up with his dinner all over the floor. One had a screw that had been pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: Napa Otter

customer_reviews.title: Do not Purchase! Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ! These scratches came with just basic normal use , I bought them for New Years for more people to eat on and have not used much since then . I would highly not recommend them
customer_reviews.author: MELIMEL

customer_reviews.title: Leg does not lock into open position
customer_reviews.text: I spent a great deal of time reading reviews and researching these tables prior to purchasing them. I was very disappointed when I opened the Box to find out that they were not what I expected. One customer specifically asked if the tray leg locks into place and was told yes they do. The leg does not lock into place, there is a slide bar underneath which does not secure the table and the open position. I will be sending in these back and continued to research hoping that I can find what I'm looking for prior to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tables are of good quality but the package arrived with no hardware
customer_reviews.text: The tables are of good quality but the package arrived with no hardware. Dealing with Winsome, the manufacturer, however has not been great. They are very hard to contact, no phones just email and you have wait for a response. Their response makes you feel like you’ve done something wrong or are inconveniencing them. Will not order another product from this company. Update: After 7 months the tables are falling apart. The hardware is cheap and flimsy, the wood is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These really impressed me and my husband. Really nice quality made of real wood not press board! Easy to put the holder together really nice and my family is really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie L Parks

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and good buy for price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how light weight these trays were. Originally I was worried that they would not be very sturdy but they are functional, White Waite, a really good buy for what we needed. Easy to put away. I was surprised how light weight these trays were. Originally I was worried that they would not be very sturdy but they are functional, white weight, a really goodbye for what we needed. Easy to put away
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my wife. Was easy to assemble (only real assembly is the stand). Wood seems to be good quality and they have held up nicely for the last three months. Each tray is fairly light weight to move but very sturdy. Color in picture is fairly accurate representation of color you get.
customer_reviews.author: MIke M

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good trays. I guess the same goes for all ...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part they work but then the screws come off. If you are able to screw the screws back in and they stay the trays work otherwise you are at a loss. Maybe some wood glue with the screw might work but haven't tried it. Otherwise good trays. I guess the same goes for all brands.
customer_reviews.author: SDRube

customer_reviews.title: The stand leans because the screws are too short
customer_reviews.text: Overall this would have been a good value if the stand for the TV trays wasn't so janky. The screws are a too-small diameter and are too short to support all four trays without leaning.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, beautiful wood.
customer_reviews.text: This has simple assembly using screwdriver & wood glue. Very nice looking trays, heaver than I expected. The edges under the trays have sharp edges I will sand, an EZ fix. I like these trays, good quality at fare price.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight0

customer_reviews.title: Good look, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sturdy built, easy to assemble. Had one screw on the base that would not tighten (hole stripped out a bit) but it is still sturdy and not loose or wobley.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: A very light weight wood, but they do the trick for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This looks great, but the density of the wood is much lighter than expected. Still, for the price, just fine. The stand it comes with is really cheesy and not that durable, I busted it too easily after just a few weeks of use.Tables still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugly!
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer doesn't care what the surface of their tables will look like. They use bad wood and the tables look cheap and poorly made because of that. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I like these tables, they are very solid and easy to assemble. However, I would recommend getting the birch wood colot set instead of this dark brown color. Paint finishing this one is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Random Dude

customer_reviews.title: A better find
customer_reviews.text: I needed another set of these TV tables for my family room. I checked other sites and even stores in the area I live; they were either over priced or so cheaply made you would think they would fall apart it something too heavy was set on them. I am very happy with my TV tables, they came in very handy when we had a party at our house and needed places for people to sit an eat. They are very sturdy, there is some assembly but it is not hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: navy wife

customer_reviews.title: Good to have for TV tray stand
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought these instead of individual one. Have station to storage . It’s easy to assemble. Came with everything you need for assembling. nice shiny color.
customer_reviews.author: allison parker

customer_reviews.title: Value and good quality set
customer_reviews.text: I like that this was an affordable and good quality set of tables + stand. They’re pretty standard TV dinner tables, and they look nice. No complaints, and not much else to say :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy. They are stable TV trays. I use one for a computer, another for eating, and have extras for guests. They fold up nicely. Putting together the storage rack had some challenges (I like building things and am fairly decent at following construction directions) and now it's leaning a little bit (after several months) but the trays are still organized and it's great to have a place to put them. The wood is nice and smooth, so I do use a cloth napkin or a coaster to make sure drinks don't slip off.
customer_reviews.author: TCBK

customer_reviews.title: I love them very nice wood.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way everything came ready to go. All I had to do was setup the holder for the tables, and when I mean setup I mean put it upright. Then I put the tables on it, except for the one I was going to use. Been using it ever since. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Shrader

customer_reviews.title: The table does not wiggle and is secure.
customer_reviews.text: They came in perfect condition. The stand had to be put together, laid on the pieces on the floor with the screws etc so easy to pick the needed item, and it took about 12 minutes. The dowels had to be pushed in to tighten the stand.
customer_reviews.author: returning student

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Great for price point. It has a nice rack that comes with it as well. My only dislike is that it is a little tall, even with a normal height couch.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware !!!
customer_reviews.text: These tables are terrible, they are thin, poorly made and have unfinished tops, on one table, one leg is shorter then the others so it wobbles. turns out they came from K'Mart, had I known that I would have known they weren't the quality I was looking for. I would not have brought them. Only reason they were not returned was because the box was to heavy for me to carry back to UPS, and I was on my way out of state. So I'm stuck with them. DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: If I had seen these in person I would not have bought them. They are cheap made, not sturdy at all and the legs are too rough for my wood floors and they are not flat on the bottom to put the felt pads on and expect them to stay. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Put rubber feet on these, they are very lightweight. Great for when company is over and you don't have a large enough dinner table, the kids can eat on these. I am happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: 1. When lifting up the table top to move, one must reach under and hold the legs or the legs will colapse potentially spilling whatever is on the table top. The legs do not lock in place. 2. There is a brace near the ground on the front legs. Even my mother, who is short can easily kick it and knock it over. There is no room for your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Engelen

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: They were a little pricey for what they are, but they are nice and serve the purpose that I bought them for. I love the stand and that these can be folded up and kept off to the side until they are needed. Stand was easy to put together, however, I lost the instructions but luckily was able to find an instructional video online.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, good design
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They're TV trays so I'm really not looking for anything fancy...if I'm eating a meal at a TV tray, I'm not exactly hosting a charity gala or anything. But the design is really good, the leg that moves underneath the tray, so that you can fold it flat, is held in place by a metal bar that prevents it from coming out and smashing your fingers. That's hard to explain but it's a much better design than my previous TV trays.
customer_reviews.author: Corwin C.

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues, no damages, I like the look of these. They aren't as think as my 15 year old set but the looks is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Came quick, like me on a drunken weekend.... Nothing was wrong with them and the caddy was easy to assemble. Plus I got a phenomenal deal on them on Cyber Monday... Winning!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Williams Jr

customer_reviews.title: Doin' What They Do
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They're functional and nice enough looking that I don't feel I need to hide them in a closet if company comes over.
customer_reviews.author: Luckipuppi

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the most solidly constructed tables, but they fit the description we wanted for the price we were willing to pay, so we'll be keeping them. I looked everywhere for these and compared/contrasted a lot of options that I found online. I'm sure you could get a more sturdy set, but it would probably be in the mid $100 range. We've only used them a few times, so I can't speak to their durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: ATOP

customer_reviews.title: Love our set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, great set for our purposes - family room TV trays. Nicely hefty, stand is stable, matches quality of two tables bought sepately years ago. Well made, and exactly what we were looking for. No marks or blemishes. They are currently handing in their stand next to the couch in an orderly fashion. Very happy with our purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s not what I expected as it is very lightweight and it’s mid grade sturdy and not the height I expected- but it does the job. They aren’t worth it! The wood split on the top of one and they aren’t use everyday. Wouldn’t recommend. Spend a little more and get good ones
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: They are made of solid sturdy wood, I'd expect you'd have to purposely try ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what tables negative reviewers received, but the ones I got were exactly as described & expected. They are made of solid sturdy wood, I'd expect you'd have to purposely try to nick or scratch to cause any damage. They do not seem cheaply made and are very attractive; something you don't typically expect when you think of TV tables...I'm surprised at the cost, I'd expect a set like this to be $150-$200, so I'm very pleased. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: 🌸The Vu Family🌸

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Alex Snack Table Natural Set 5 Pc
product_meta.description:
Color:NaturalWith smooth, broad tops, these solid wood TV tables can easily hold a large meal, and the upright stand stores them discretely when not in use.

AMAZON.COM
TV tables are simply unmatched for easy versatility--from casual sofa-side dinners to extra serving space to a place to play solitaire, their uses seems almost endless. This 5-piece version by Winsome Wood offers up that famous functionality in a tidy, clean-lined package. Crafted of solid beechwood with a richly grained natural finish, the roomy rectangular tabletops feature softly rounded edges and perch on slender square folding legs. Add a bud vase and a linen napkin, and the look is actually quite charming! The four tables store flat on their matching stand that has notched arms to keep the surfaces from knocking together. A handle on top makes it easy to tote the whole unit from one room to the next. The tables measure 19 inches wide by 14.6 inches deep by 26 inches high. Assembly is required. --Kara Karll
feature_bullets: Crafted of solid beechwood with natural finish
Roomy rectangular tabletops with rounded edges; slender square legs; top handle on stand for easy transport
The tables measure 19 inches wide by 14.6 inches deep by 26 inches high
Recommended Cleaning Method: Wipe Clean with Dry cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,378 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
